thread.title: Kenya: Raila Odinga: Kenya is ailing from rampant corruption and failed Jubilee promises
thread.title_full: Kenya: Raila Odinga: Kenya is ailing from rampant corruption and failed Jubilee promises

title: Kenya: Raila Odinga: Kenya is ailing from rampant corruption and failed Jubilee promises
text:
Your are here » Home » Kenya Raila Odinga: Kenya is ailing from rampant corruption and failed Jubilee promises By Mercy Asamba | Updated Sat, February 4th 2017 at 17:17 GMT +3 SHARE THIS ARTICLE Share on Twitter Raila Odinga and Isaac Ruto in Bomet. 
Cord leader Raila Odinga has said Kenya is ailing from rampant corruption and failed Jubilee government promises. He has pledged to resolve problems Kenyans face if they will support NASA movement. 
National super alliance in Bomet marks the milestone of the opposition where leaders came together in unity to support the movement. 
The movement brought together the following leaders: Amani National Congress(ANC) Musalia Mudavadi, Mombasa Governor Ali Hassan Joho, Kakamega Senator Boni Khalwale, Bungoma Senator Moses Wetang’ula, Wiper party leader Kalonzo Musyoka, Secretary General for Kanu Nick Salat among other leaders. 
Raila has condemned the Jubilee government for not addressing the needs of the farmers in the Rift valley yet it is the region that Kenyans rely on for food.
